summary: This document is an email chain from November 2021 regarding the completion of a 'photo sourcing project' for trial preparation. An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is following up on a spreadsheet containing photos with evidence item IDs, CD names, and location info.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of an external email on September 27, 2021, checking on the status of a photo sourcing project for trial preparation.

events.title: Follow-up on Photo Sourcing Project
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends an email checking on the status of a photo sourcing project for trial preparation.

events.title: Photo Project Completion
events.description: An individual (name redacted) completes the photo sourcing project, adding columns for Evidence Item ID, Name of CD, and Location of Item to a spreadsheet.

events.title: Email Forwarding of Photo Project
events.description: The email chain regarding the completed photo sourcing project is forwarded.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Prosecutors were actively preparing for trial in late 2021, as evidenced by a 'photo sourcing project'.
The project involved organizing photos with metadata including Evidence Item ID, Name of CD, and Location of Item.
The correspondence involves an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The document shows ongoing legal case preparation work after Jeffrey Epstein's death.
